metadata.description: Official Superconductor plugin marketplace for Claude Code and other agents.

plugins.name: video-understanding
plugins.description: Analyze and understand video content using Google Gemini. Supports local video files (mp4, mov, webm, avi, mkv) and YouTube links up to an hour long.

plugins.name: audio-understanding
plugins.description: Transcribe and analyze audio content using Google Gemini. Supports local audio files (mp3, wav, m4a, ogg, flac) and YouTube links up to 9.5 hours long.

plugins.name: image-generation
plugins.description: Generate high-quality images from text descriptions using Google Gemini's image models. Can also use existing images or videos as reference for style guidance.

plugins.name: video-generation
plugins.description: Create 4-8 second videos from text prompts using Google Veo models. Supports image-to-video animation and native audio generation including dialogue and sound effects.

plugins.name: text-to-speech
plugins.description: Convert text to natural-sounding speech using Google Gemini TTS models. Supports 30 different voices and 24 languages with automatic language detection.

plugins.name: gemini-consultation
plugins.description: Get a second opinion from Google Gemini AI. Useful for analyzing documents (PDFs up to 50MB), images, or getting Gemini's perspective on any topic.
